impressions: Number of times your posts are seen by users
engagements: Number of times your posts are liked, shared, or commented on
clicks: Number of times users click on your post to visit your website
ctr: Click-through rate: The ratio of clicks to impressions
cpc: Cost per click: This includes content costs and organic clicks
conversions: Number of sales that your posts directly led to
cost: The amount of the post's promotional budget that has been used, or N/A if the post was not promoted
revenue: The total amount of money that your posts brought in
